caption: Worst afternoon tea! Tea sandwiches were thick dry day old bread not neatly trimmed and filling was dry. I have had many wonderful delicious teas at a quarter of the price! My family will not be coming back. Not worth $130/person plus hefty gratuity!  .

Service was absolutely terrible. Our waiter, Rami, was awful due to the following reasons:  he made us feel rushed, gave us the wrong recommendations for decaffeinated tea, our kids had allergies and yet the plates still contained food that …
